author: Melanie Evans, Stephanie Armour
title: NO MORE BEDS: Capacity Crosses Tipping Point...
description: NO MORE BEDS: Capacity Crosses Tipping Point... (Top headline, 7th story, link ) Related stories: Kathy Griffin hospitalized with 'unbearably painful' symptoms; Blames Trump... 3 BILLION NOW ON LOCKDOWN... Patients 'charged with attempted murder' for failing …
content:
Hospitals in U.S. pandemic epicenters have passed a tipping point in the fight against the new coronavirus as the relentless climb in infections forces some to move patients to outlying facilities, divert ambulances and store bodies in a refrigerated truck.
